TopicTitle: Can't edit my mod on Curseforge

Articles.Content: I'm logged in on Curseforge, but can't make any changes to my mods. What do I do?
Could you elaborate a bit more on what you mean? What specifically is not working?
I can't change anything. Nowhere is there a button that gives me access to uploading new version, changing the name, etc. The mod page looks like something that a normal user would see.
Which mod are we talking about? And what is your account name?
Leaufai and both of my mods: Strategem and RCS+
are you logged in? I created a clone of you, and all of the buttons are accessible.
I see now that I was accessing it through Curse. When accessed through Curseforge it looks like this. Thanks for the help!
Ah.. that would do it too. Glad its working for you now.
